sourceString: This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces.
targetString: Wannan yana kiyaye sake gurbata hannaye da wadannan farfajiya.
en-mt: This keeps the hands from re-contaminating these surfaces.

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.
targetString: Dalilin wanke hannu a cikin tsarin kula da lafiya shine a cire kwaya cututtukan jini wato pathogenic microorganisms (kwayar cutar) kuma su guji yada su.
en-mt: The purpose of hand washing in the health care system is to remove pathogenic microorganisms and prevent them from spreading.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: Sabuwar mujalla na magani ta ba da rahoto da cewa wanke hannu a yawancin ma’aikatun lafiya ba abin karbuwa bane, yawancin likitoci da ingozomai sukan manta wanke hannu kafin taba marasa lafiya, wanda ke jawo yaduwan kananan halittu masu yada cuta.
en-mt: A new medical journal reports that hand washing in most health facilities is not acceptable, many doctors and nurses often forget to wash their hands before touching patients, which leads to the spread of germs.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.
targetString: Bincike ya nuna wanke hannu yadda ya dace kuma dabin sauran hanyoyin masu sauki zasu iya rage adadin catheter-cutar jini mai alaqa da kamuwa da cuta da kashi 66%, hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) ta wallafa wata takarda dake nuna daidaitaccen wanke-wanke da kuma shafa hannu a sassan Lafiya.
en-mt: Research shows that proper hand washing and other simple procedures can reduce the number of catheter-related blood infections by 66%, the World Health Organization (WHO) has published a document on proper hand washing. and rubbing hands in the Health Department.

sourceString: The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment.
targetString: Ana iya samun wannan ka’idoji na tsabtan hannu na kugiyan daga sashin yanar gizon ra’ayin jama’a.
en-mt: This hand hygiene protocol can be found in the public opinion section of the website.

sourceString: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.
targetString: Whitby et al. Sun gudanar da bita mai dacewa.
en-mt: Whitby et al. They conducted a proper review.

sourceString: Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required.
targetString: Na’urorin kasuwanci na iya auna tsaftan hannu, idan ana bukatan tsari, ana bukatan yarda.
en-mt: Commercial devices can measure hand hygiene, if a process is required, compliance is required.

sourceString: The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands:
targetString: Kungiyar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) na da lokuta biyar (Five Moments) na wanke hannaye:
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has five moments (Five Moments) to wash hands:

sourceString: after exposure to blood/body fluids
targetString: bayan alaka da abin da ya kunshi jini ko ruwan jiki.
en-mt: after contact with blood or body fluids.

sourceString: before an aseptic task, and
targetString: Kafin aiki aseptic, dakuma
en-mt: Before working aseptically,

sourceString: after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent.
targetString: bayan jiyyan mara lafiya. Karin sinadarin kashe cuta a sabulu (sabulun "maganin cuta" ko "maganin kwayoyin cuta) yana kara karfin kashe cuta ga man wanke hannu.
en-mt: after the patient's treatment. Adding an antiseptic to the soap ("sanitizer" or "antibacterial" soap) increases the disinfectant power of the hand wash.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.
targetString: Ana iya son irin wannan kisan kafin a yi aikin tiyata ko a saiti, acikin kwayoyin juriya masu daukaka sosai, cuda hannuwa don aikin tiyata, wajibi ne a sami famfo wanda za'a iya kunna da kashewa ba tare da taɓawa da hannu ba, Wasu chlorhexidine ko aidin na wanke abu, bakararren tawul don bushewar hannu bayan an wanke, da bakararren burushi saboda cudawa da kuma wasu bakararren kayan aiki don tsaftace karkashin farce.
en-mt: This type of killing may be desired before surgery or in the setting, in high resistance cells, hand contact for surgery, it is necessary to have a pump that can be turned on and off without touching by hand, Others chlorhexidine or iodine for washing things, sterile towels for drying hands after washing, sterile brushes for contact and other sterile tools for cleaning under the nails.

sourceString: All jewelry should be removed.
targetString: A cire dukan kayan ado.
en-mt: Remove all jewelry.

sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: Wannan hanya na bukatan wanke hannaye akalla mintuna 2 zuwa 6.
en-mt: This method requires washing hands for at least 2 to 6 minutes.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: Dogon lokacin-gogewa (minti 10) ba lallai ba ne.
en-mt: Long time-experiencing (10 minutes) is not necessary.

sourceString: When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands.
targetString: Yayinda ake wanke hannaye, kada a yarda a bar ruwa a gaban hannu yana komawa bayan hannu.
en-mt: While washing the hands, do not allow water to flow in front of the hand and return to the back of the hand.

sourceString: After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned.
targetString: Bayan an gama wanke hannu, hannayen sun bushe da kayan mara tabarau kuma an yi wa kayan wanki tiyata.
en-mt: After washing the hands, the hands are dried with non-glasses and the laundry is operated.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.
targetString: Don rage yaduwar kwayar cuta, yana da kyaw a wanke hannuwa ko anfani da sabulun kariya kafin da kuma bayan dubawar mara lafiya.
en-mt: To reduce the spread of germs, it is good to wash hands or feet with protective soap before and after examining the patient.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: Domin magance kamuwa da cutan staphylococcal a asibitai, an gano cewa babban amfanin wanke hannu har kashi 20% da karamar karin amfanin wanda aka samo lokacin wanke hannu kullum ya karu fiye da kashi 35%.
en-mt: In order to treat staphylococcal infection in hospitals, it was found that the high benefit of hand washing up to 20% and the small additional benefit obtained during daily hand washing increased by more than 35%.

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: Wankewa da sabulu na yau da kullun yana haifar da sakamako sama da sau uku na ƙwayar cuta ta kwayar cutar zuwa abinci idan aka kwatanta da wanka tare da sabulu mai ƙwayar cuta. Kwatanta hannun-shafa tare da maganin shaye-shaye tare da wankewar hannu tare da sabulu na kwayar cuta na tsawon mintuna 30 na kowannensu ya nuna cewa barasa mai amfani da giya ya rage gurbatar kwayar cuta 26% fiye da sabulu na kwayar cuta.
en-mt: Washing with regular soap results in more than three times the transmission of the virus to food compared to washing with soap containing bacteria. A comparison of hand-washing with alcohol-based handwashing and hand washing with antibacterial soap for 30 minutes each showed that alcohol-based hand sanitizer reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than antibacterial soap.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: Amma sabulu da ruwa yafi inganci akan sinadarin man alcohol wanda ake gogawa don raguwar H1N1 na cutar amai da gudawa dakuma clostridium defficile spores daga hannu, Ayyuka don inganta tsabtace hannu a cikin tsarin kula da lafiya na iya haɓaka ilimi ga ma'aikata a kan wanke hannu, da wadatar samar da sinadarin wanke hannu na goga wa da rubutattun fi'iloli da tunatarwa ga ma'aikatan.
en-mt: But soap and water are more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs to reduce H1N1 diarrhea and clostridium difficile spores from hands. hand, and sufficient supply of hand sanitizer and written reminders for employees.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: Akwai buƙatar ƙarin bincike, a gano aciki wannen suka fi tasiri a tsarin kulawa da lafiya daban-daban.
en-mt: There is a need for more research, to find out which ones are most effective in different health care systems.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: A kasashe masu tasowa, ana ganin wanke hannu da sabulu a matsayin hanya mai sauki, hanya mai kyau na samun lafiya, da ma cin abinci mai kyau.
en-mt: In developing countries, washing hands with soap is seen as an easy way, a good way to be healthy, and even to eat well.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: Ko da yake rashin ingantaccen ruwan sha, sabulu da kayan wanke hannu a gidaje, makarantu da wurin aiki ya sa yazama ƙalubale don cimma yanayin wanke hannu na duniya.
en-mt: However, the lack of safe drinking water, soap and handwashing facilities in homes, schools and workplaces makes it a challenge to achieve universal handwashing standards.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: Misali a mafi yawan yankunan karkara na afirca famfunan wanke hannu na kusa da bayan gida na gwamnati kona gida yana da karanci, dukda cewa akwai zaɓuɓɓuka masu arha don gina tashoshin wanke hannu.
en-mt: For example, in most rural areas of Africa hand washing pumps close to public toilets are in short supply, although there are cheap options to build hand washing stations.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: Kodayake ƙarancin filin wanke-wanke yana iya zama sakamakon al'ada maimakon rashin sabulu da ruwa.
en-mt: Although the lack of washing space may be the result of habit rather than lack of soap and water.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: Bayar da shawarwari a kan wanke hannu da sabulu na iya yin tasiri wurin yanke shawara, kara sani a kan muhimmancin wanke hannu kuma na iya kawo canjin halayan mutane.
en-mt: Advising on hand washing with soap can influence decision making, increase awareness of the importance of hand washing and can change people's attitudes.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: Don wannan yayi aiki yadda yakamata, saka idanu da kimantawa wajibi ne.
en-mt: For this to work properly, monitoring and evaluation is necessary.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: A wata bita na bincike guda 70 ta nuna hanyan wayar da kai kan wanke hannu cikin al’umma ta fi inganci a wajen kara amincewa da wanke hannu a LMICs, sannan camfen na tallan jama’a ba shi da wani inganci mai kyau. Wata misali domin wayar da kai kan wanke hannu a makarantu shine “Three Star Approach” wadda UNICEF ta kago wanda ke karfafa makarantu su dauki matakai marasa sada domin ganin cewa dalibai sun wanke hannayensu da sabulu, tare da wasu hanyoyi na tsafta.
en-mt: A review of 70 studies showed that community-based handwashing awareness was more effective in increasing handwashing acceptance in LMICs, while mass marketing campaigns were less effective. Another example for raising awareness about hand washing in schools is the "Three Star Approach" that UNICEF has created which encourages schools to take special measures to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, along with other hygienic methods.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: Idan aka iya cimma burin,makarantu na iya masawa zuwa fanni na tauraron karshe.
en-mt: If the goal can be achieved, the school can move to the final star category.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: Gina wuraren wanke hannu na iya zama hanya ta kamfen da gabatarwa da ake yi domin rage cututtuka da mutuwan yara kanana.
en-mt: Building hand washing facilities can be a way of campaigning and promoting to reduce diseases and deaths of young children.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: Ranar wanke hannu na duniya wata misali ce ta kara sani da ke kokarin canza halaya. Sakamakon anobar cutan coronavirus 2019-20, UNICEF ta inganta amfani da emoji na wanke hannu.
en-mt: World Handwashing Day is another example of awareness that is trying to change behavior. Due to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF has promoted the use of hand washing emoji.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: ''Yan nazarin kalilan sun yi la’akari da tasirin farashin wanke hannu a kasashe masu tasowa, a cikin alaƙar da aka hana DALY.
en-mt: Few studies have considered the cost effectiveness of handwashing in developing countries, in relation to DALYs prevented.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: Koyaya, an bada shawara cewa inganta wanke hannu da sabulu yana da matukar tasiri fiye da sauran ruwa da tsabta.
en-mt: However, it has been suggested that improved hand washing with soap is more effective than other water and hygiene.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: Muhimmancin wanke hannu domin lafiya mutum musamman ma mutanen da ke mummunan yanayi kamar uwaye da suka haihu ko kuma sojoji da suke da rauni a asibiti tana da asali ne a tsakiyan karni ta sha tara (19th Century) ta wurin majagaba na tsabtan hannu guda biyu. ikitan Hugary Ignaz Semmelweis wanda ya yi aiki a Vienna, Austria da Florence Nightingale, baturiya “da ta kafa reno na zamani”.
en-mt: The importance of hand washing for human health, especially people who are in a bad situation such as mothers who have given birth or soldiers who are injured in the hospital has its origins in the middle of the nineteenth century (19th Century) by the pioneers of two hand hygiene. Hugary Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria with Florence Nightingale, the battery that "founded modern nursing".

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: A lokacin can yawancin mutane sun gaskanta cewa kamuwa da cutar na faruwa ne ta wurin wani wari mai suna miasmas.
en-mt: At that time, most people believed that the infection was caused by a smell called miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: A shekarun 1980, barkewar cuta daga abinci da haɗarin kamuwa da cuta don rashin kulawa da lafiya ya kai Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da Kariya na U.S. wato U.S Center for Disease Control and Prevention ga karfafawar tsabtacewar hannu a matseyin hanya mai dacewa ga kariya daga yaduwar cututtuka.
en-mt: In the 1980s, outbreaks of food-borne illness and the risk of contamination due to poor hygiene led the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to encourage hand hygiene as an effective way to prevent the spread of disease. .

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: Cutar amai da gudawa a shekara ta 2009 da cutar ta COVID-19 a 2020 ta haifar da fadakarwa a kasashe da dama mahimmancin wanke hannu da sabulu don kare kai daga irin wannan cutar.
en-mt: The vomiting and diarrhea disease in 2009 and the COVID-19 disease in 2020 caused awareness in many countries about the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from this disease.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: A misali, an rataya takaddan wayar da kai mai dauke da “hanyoyi ingantattu na wanke hannu,” kusa da inda ake wanke hannu a wurin bayi na jama’a da kuma wurin ba haya na ma’aikatu da filiayen jiragen sama a Jamus.
en-mt: For example, posters with "good hand washing practices" are posted near hand washing facilities in public restrooms and in the non-rental areas of ministries and airports in Germany.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: Kalamai nan "wanke hannun wani" wani abu, yana nufin ayyana waɗanda basu yarda ba su ɗauki alhakin abin ko kuma suka yi tarayya cikin wahala.
en-mt: The expression "to wash one's hands" of something, means to declare those who do not agree to take responsibility for it or share in the suffering.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: Ya samo asali daga nassi na Baibul a cikin matthew, inda Pontius Pilate ya wanke hannun sa don giciye Yesu Kristi, amma sun zama zance tare da yawan yin amfani cikin al’uman Turanci.
en-mt: It originates from the passage of the Bible in Matthew, where Pontius Pilate washed his hands for the cross of Jesus Christ, but they became a conversation with a lot of use in English society.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: A takaddan Shakespeare mai suna Macbeth, Lady Macbeth ta fara naciyan wanke hannaye da tunanin share tabo da take tunani, wadda ya nuna lamirinta ya kasheta a kan laifi da ta aikata kuma ta sa mijinta aikatawa.
en-mt: In Shakespeare's play called Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to insist on washing her hands and thinking of cleaning the stain that she thinks, which shows her conscience to kill her for the crime she committed and caused her husband to commit.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: An kuma gano cewa wasu mutane sukan wanke hannayensu sau da yawa, fiye da sauran jama’a bayan sun yi tunanin aikata wani abin da ya saba wa doka, kuma sukan martaba kayan wanke hannu fiye da saura.
en-mt: It has also been found that some people wash their hands more often than the rest of the population after thinking about doing something illegal, and they value hand sanitizer more than others.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: Bugu da kari, wadanda aka barsu su wanke hannayensu bayan irin wannan ayukan ba a samani za su yi wani aikin tsaftacewa na ramako, kamar sadaukarwa.
en-mt: In addition, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such acts are not in the sky will perform a cleansing act of revenge, like sacrifice.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: Addinai suna gargadin wanke hannu domin tsabta da alaman ibada. Wanke hannu domin ibada, amfani da ruwa amma banda sabulu domin wanke hannaye, yana cikin wanke hannu domin ibada a addinai da yawa, ya hada da Imanin Baha’i, Hinduism, tevilah da netilat yadayim a Judaism, Lavado a Kiristanci, da wundu a Islam. Addinai su ma suna gargadin tsabtan wanke hannu, musamman bayan wasu ayuka.
en-mt: Religions warn about washing hands for cleanliness and signs of worship. Washing hands for worship, using water but not soap to wash hands, is part of washing hands for worship in many religions, including the Baha'i Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, lavado in Christianity, and wundu in Islam. Religions also warn about washing hands, especially after certain activities.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: Addinin hindu, juda da addinin musulunci sun yarda da wanke hannaye bawai anfani da bayan gida.
en-mt: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam agree to wash hands and toilet.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: Sannan Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism da Islam suna da umurnin wanke hannu kafin a ci abinci ko bayan kowanne cin abinci.
en-mt: And Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam have orders to wash hands before eating or after each meal.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Kula da hadarin wurin aiki domin cutar COVID-19
en-mt: Managing workplace risks for COVID-19

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Lura da hadarin wurin aiki daga CoVID-19 suna kariya a wurin aiki da hanyoyin kiwon lafiya don lura da hadari zuwa kare mutane daga kamuwa da cutar coronavirus COVID-19 shekarar 2019.
en-mt: Monitoring the risk of the workplace from CoVID-19 are protection in the workplace and health measures to monitor the risk to protect people from the infection of the coronavirus COVID-19 in 2019.

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Lurawa na kwarai ga hadari a wurin aiki ya danganta ga yanayin wurin aikin da aikin, dangane da bincikan hadari dake tare da wurin yaduwan cutar, tsananin cutar a al’uma, da kuma hadari dake tare da ma’aikata wanda suna iya kamuwa da COVID-19.
en-mt: Appropriate risk assessment in the workplace depends on the nature of the workplace and the work, in terms of assessing the risk associated with the spread of the disease, the severity of the disease in the community, and the risk with workers who may be infected with COVID. -19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Dangane da Hukumar Kula da Lafiya da Kiwon Lafiya wato Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), hadarin bayyana ga kankantan aikin huldawa tare da jama’a da wasu abokan aiki wanda ake bada shawarar matakan kariya na kamuwa da cuta, hade da wanke hannu, karfafa ma’aikata su kasance a gida idan ba su da lafiya, Da'awar numfashi, shara na yau da kullun, share da kashe kwayar cuta a yanayin wurin aiki.
en-mt: According to the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), the risk of exposure to small contact work with the public and other co-workers is recommended for infection prevention measures, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay at home if they are sick, Breathing claims, regular garbage, cleaning and disinfecting the workplace environment.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Aiki wadanda suke da haɗarin cutar sun haɗa da waɗanda ke buƙata kulum ko huldawa da mutane ba a san su ba ko zaton suna da cutar COVID-19, amma suna iya kamuwa saboda yaduwar da ke kan faruwa cikin al’umma ko tafiya kasar waje.
en-mt: Those who are at risk of the disease include those who need daily contact with people who are not known or suspected to have the disease of COVID-19, but may be infected due to the spread that occurs in the community or travel abroad.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Hakan ya hada da ma’aikata wadanda suke da hulɗa da jama’a kamar makarantu, yanayin da akwai yawan jama’a, da wuraren da ake yawan saye-saye.
en-mt: This includes workers who have contact with the public such as schools, crowded areas, and shopping areas.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: Kulawar haɗari ga wadannan rukuni, bugu da kari game da hanyoyin karewar daga kamuwa da cuta ya hada da, na’urar bada iska wanda ke amfani da abun tacewar iska maikyau, abin rufe atishawa da samun kayayyakin sa a jiki idan har akwai wanda ya kamu da cutar COVID-19.
en-mt: Risk management for these groups, in addition to measures to protect against infection, includes a ventilator that uses an air filter, a sneeze mask and personal protective equipment if someone is infected. and the disease of COVID-19.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA tana ɗaukar ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya da ma’aikatan gidan da aka fallasa ga sanannen mutum ko wanda ake zargi da COVID-19 kasance cikin haɗarin haɗari sosai, wanda ke ƙaruwa zuwa babban haɗarin haɗuwa idan ma’aikata suka bi ka’idar fesawar aerosl, ko tattarawa ko sarrafa samfuran daga, sanannu ko mutumin da ake zaton yana da cutar COVID-19.
en-mt: OSHA considers health care workers and household workers who have been exposed to a known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high risk, which increases to a high risk of exposure if workers follow the spraying protocol. aerosl, or collect or process samples from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
