sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) sun bada shawarar cewa a kebe sabbin marasa lafiya a wasu wurare daban zai dangata ko wani ne wanda ya kamu da cutar COVID-19.. Bugu da kari zuwa wasu PPE, OSHA an shawarta yin amfani da na’urar bada iska ga wadanda suke aiki tsakanin kafa 6 ga marasa lafiyan da aka sani ko wanda ake gani na da cutar, SARS-COV-2, da wadanda ke yin ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating procedures.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has recommended that new patients be isolated in different areas depending on whether they are infected with COVID-19. In addition to some PPE, OSHA is advised to use ventilators for those working within 6 feet of patients known or suspected of having the disease, SARS-COV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: A kasar Amurka, NIOSH ta amince da N95 don tace abin numfashi ko ma yin amfani dasu da kyau, an samu kariya wanda ya hada da gwaji mai kyau, karantarwa da kuma gwajin asibiti.
en-mt: In the United States, NIOSH has approved N95 respirators for proper use and protection, including proper testing, training and clinical trials.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Wasu na’uran iska suna iya karewa mai kyau tare da inganta jin dadin ma’aikata. WHO ba ta amince yin amfani da kabido ba, don COVID-19 ciwon ne na hanyar numfashi wanda ke yaduwa ta hanyar ruwan jiki.
en-mt: Some air conditioners can protect the good and improve the well-being of the workers. WHO does not approve the use of kabido, because COVID-19 is a respiratory disease that spreads through bodily fluids.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO ta shawarta cewa abun rufe fuska na asibiti ya dace ga ma’aikan dubawa don point-of-entry.
en-mt: WHO recommends that medical masks are suitable for point-of-entry checkpoints.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Ga wadanda ke karban samfuring gwajin hanyar numfashi daga, lura wa, ko tafiyar da wanda ya kamu da COVID-19 ba tare da ka’idar fesawar aerosl ba wato aerosol-generating procedure, WHO ta shawarta cewa, abin rufe fuskar tiyata, tabarau, ko garkuwar fuska, babban riga, da safar hannu.
en-mt: For those who receive respiratory samples from, observe, or handle a person infected with COVID-19 without an aerosol-generating procedure, WHO recommends that surgical masks, goggles, or a face shield, a coat, and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Idan an bi ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating akayi, zai mayar da gurbin amfani da abin rufe fuskar asibiti wato N95 ko abin numfashi FFP2.
en-mt: If the principle of aerosol-generating is followed, it will replace the use of a hospital mask that is N95 or an FFP2 respirator.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Ganin cewa wadatarwar PPE a duniya bai isa ba, WHO ta ba da shawarar rage buƙatar PPE ta hanyar ba da magunguna ta hanyar sadarwa, shinge na jiki kamar wani budadeyar abun rufe fuska, barin waɗanda ke da hannu cikin kulawa kai tsaye su shiga daki da mai kamu da cutar COVID-19 yake, yin amfani da PPE kawai don takamaiman aikin, ci gaba da amfani da na’urar bada iska wanda aka saba ba tare da cire shi ba yayin da kulawa da marasa lafiya da yawa da cuta iri daya, lura da daidaita wadatarwar yawan PPE, da kuma hana amfani da abin rufe fuska ga mutane da suke da alamar cutar.
en-mt: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, the WHO recommends reducing the need for PPE by providing medication through communication, a physical barrier such as an open face mask, allowing those involved in direct care to enter the room and is infected with COVID-19, using PPE only for the specific task, continuing to use the ventilator that is used without removing it while caring for several patients with the same disease, monitor and regulate the supply of PPE, and prevent the use of masks for people who have symptoms of the disease.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: DAGA: Katherine Maher, Shugaban Gidauniyar Wikimedia
en-mt: BY: Katherine Maher, President of the Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: ZUWA: Dukka Ma’akacin Gidauniyar Wikimedia
en-mt: COURTESY: All courtesy of the Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: LAYIN TAKE: [Covid-19] Ragewar kayan da kuma shiri don gaba
en-mt: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Inventory reduction and planning for the future

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: TURA KWANA/LOKACI: Ranar 14 ga watan Maris, 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: POSTPONED DATE/TIME: March 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: Bada dama: CC0: No rights reserved
en-mt: Copyright: CC0: No rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Mun samu kanmu cikin wani yanayi kwarai a wannan watan.
en-mt: We have found ourselves in a unique situation this month.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Annobar COVID-19 wani abu ne da ke bayyanarwar dangantakar mu a duniya da kuma nauyin da ya rataya ga kowanen mu.
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic is a reflection of our relationship with the world and the responsibility it places on each of us.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Ba mu da fi son domin kalubale, amma mun tsani cewa, amsar mu ya danganta ga tausayawa, hadin gwiwa da ginan al’uma wanda yake zaune cikin zuciyar gungiyar.
en-mt: We do not like to challenge, but we hate that our answer depends on empathy, cooperation and community building which resides in the heart of the group.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Zaman tare da kulawa da muka gani a cikin dukkanin abokan aikin namu kan imel, kira, da taɗi wani tabbaci ne na tabbataccen mutane muna da sa’a sosai don aiki tare.
en-mt: The interaction we have seen in all of our colleagues over email, call, and chat is a testament to the positive people we are very fortunate to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Bazan yi kasa a gwuiwa ba na insaku cikin abokan aikina ba.
en-mt: I will not give up on my colleagues.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Makon jiya, wani ya raba godiyar sa ga aikin mu
en-mt: Last week, someone shared his appreciation for our work

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Sun tunastar da ni yaddan duniyar ta iya sauya Wikipea ayanzu, wanda ta zama zakaran gwajin dafi ta kasance bude a yanar gizo kuma ga kowa
en-mt: They reminded me how much the world can change Wikipea now, which has become the champion of the test of being open on the web and for everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Ayyukan ka sun sa wannan ya yiwu, shin ka kiyaye shafukan yanar gizon su tsaya ko abokan aikinmu sun biya ko kuma daga ajiyar al'ummomin mu.
en-mt: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the website up and running whether it's paid for by our partners or from the savings of our communities.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Duniya tana bukatar bayanan da Wikipeidia ka bayarwa, fiye da haka yanzu.
en-mt: The world needs the information provided by Wikipedia, more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Wannan lokaci ne wanda ba abin da mu ke yi ba ne, amma yadda muka yi shi, hakan zai tasiri sosai ga duniya.
en-mt: This is a time in which it is not what we do, but how we do it, that will greatly affect the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Saboda amfani mqnufqr wannan da kuma irin rawar da zaka taka zamu yi wasu yan canje-canje a tsarin aikin namu wanda hakan zai fara a mako mai zuwa.
en-mt: Due to the use of this and the role you play, we will make some changes in our work plan which will start next week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Daidaitawa ga aikin mu da tsarin aiki
en-mt: Adaptation to our work and work processes

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Kamar yadda Robyn ya ce, su kungiya c wato c-team sun hadu a daren jiya sun tattauna kusantar mu da tsari don kwanaki da watanni masu zuwa.
en-mt: As Robyn said, the c-team met last night and discussed our approach and plan for the coming days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: A wannan zancen, mun duba abin da mu ka ga zai dace ga amsar abin da mu ke fuskanta da kuma kyakyawar hanya wanda zai rike kungiyar ta dace a wannan lokacin.
en-mt: In this conversation, we looked at what we think will be appropriate for the answer to what we are facing and the best way that will keep the group right at this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Muna so mu cire damuwa da tallafawa manufan mu ga dogon lokacin.
en-mt: We want to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Idan kana son kara kira, shikenan.
en-mt: If you want to call more, that's it.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Don duka ma’aikata, Yan kwangila da ma’aikatancu/
en-mt: For all employees, contractors and employees/

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: Zatan aikin mu na ko wace rana zai zama kamar sa’oi 4 a rana, ko sa’oi 20 a mako har sai sanarwan nan gaba.
en-mt: Our daily work schedule will be 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Ba zamu ba da hutu ba - idan zaka iya aiki sosai a sa’oin da aka saba, kungiyar za to iya aiki da kai.
en-mt: We don't offer holidays - if you can work hard at regular hours, the team can work for you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Duk da haka, ba za a iya annabtar duniya a yanzu ba, kuma ya kamata a lura da kaunattatu, saya kayan miya, ko je wurin likita, lafiyar ku shine fifikon mu.
en-mt: However, the world can't be predicted now, and you should pay attention to shopping, buy groceries, or go to the doctor, your health is our priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Ba mu bi lokacin ka
en-mt: We don't follow your time

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Idan ba ku da lafiya, kada ku yi aiki
en-mt: If you are sick, do not work

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Wannan ya tafi batare da an yi magana ba, amma muna maganan sa.
en-mt: This goes without saying, but we are talking about it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Babu ranar ciwo ko bukatar PTO fada wa manajan ku da taimakon sake kalandar kungiyar ku da tsarin tabbatar muhimin panin aiki.
en-mt: No sick days or PTO needs to tell your manager with the help of your organization's re-calendar and scheduling system.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Idan an maku gwaji aka tabbatar kuna dauke da cutar COVID-19, to kabar Bryan cikin T&C Ops san haka T&C zai taimaka wajen tabbatar da cewa lamarin ya samu kulawa ta mussamman).
en-mt: (If you have been tested positive for COVID-19, Bryan's involvement in T&C Ops will help ensure that the situation receives special attention).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Za a biya cikakke Jama'ar sa’oi.
en-mt: People will be paid full hours.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Mun riga mun ce, kuma muna girmama dukkanin sadaukarwar mu ga iyar kwangilar mu da ma’aikata abokanin aikin sa’oi.
en-mt: We have already said, and we respect all of our commitment to the ability of our contract and employees to work together.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Za a biya kowa daidai da yanayin aikin da suka yi na awoyi kamar yadda yake.
en-mt: Everyone will be paid according to the nature of their work hours as it is.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Wannan ya hada da idan kana ciwo kuma ka kasa yin aiki.
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Idan zaku yii aiki, zamu tallafa maka.
en-mt: If you will work, we will support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Mutane da yawa suna mafani da aiki a matsayin hanyar turo matsalolin su a duniya kewaye da mu.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to release their problems into the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Abin da muke yi na iya zama mai bada ladan gaske, musamman irin wadannan lokutan.
en-mt: What we do can be very rewarding, especially in times like these.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Haka kuma wannan game da kula da kaine
en-mt: This is also about taking care of yourself

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Aikin mu shine yin magana da manajanka, sabo da mu san me muke bukata da yadda za mu iya daidaita.
en-mt: Our job is to talk to your manager, so we know what we need and how we can adjust.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Wasu ayyukan suna da muhimmanci.
en-mt: Some jobs are important.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Akwai wasu abubuwan da ya kamata mu ci gaba da yi.
en-mt: There are some things that we should continue to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Dogaro da aminci, da teamsungiyoyin tara kuɗi (a tsakanin sauran) suna yin aiki mai mahimmanci wanda ke buƙatar ƙarin tallafi.
en-mt: The SRE, HR Ops, Reliability, and fundraising teams (among others) perform critical work that requires additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Za mu fara aiwatar da dukkan sashin don tantance manufofin yanzu kuma musanya hankali kan tallafawa abin da ke da muhimmanci a aikin mu.
en-mt: We will begin the entire process to determine the current goals and exchange attention on supporting what is important in our work.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Akwai sauran aiki mai yawa akanmu, amma zamu mai da hankali akan masu muhimmanci.
en-mt: There is still a lot of work ahead of us, but we will focus on the important ones.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Raguwa yanzu ba zai cutar ba nan gaba.
en-mt: Slowing down now won't hurt in the future.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Bama shirin tafiya “karo-lokaci sau biyu don a cimma buri” idan annoban ta kare..
en-mt: We are not planning to go "double time to achieve the goal" when the epidemic is over..

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Baza a so ku yin aiki da karin awa ba domin yanzu lokacin gama aikin ba abu ne mai yiwuwa ba.
en-mt: You will not want to work overtime because now the time to finish the job is not possible.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Mun yardacewa yanayi ya canja, kuma zamu yi aikin da zai samar da sabbin tsare-tsare aka lokaci idan ya kama.
en-mt: We accept that the situation has changed, and we will work to create new plans when the time comes.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Me ya faru da APP (Tsarin Shekara)?
en-mt: What happened to APP (Annual Plan)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Don iya canza zuwa yanayin yanzu da sa’oin ayukan mu na yau da kullum, muna tunanin canza lokacin domin iya kai ga tsarin mu na shekara 2020-2021
en-mt: In order to adapt to our current schedule and regular business hours, we are considering changing the schedule to accommodate our 2020-2021 schedule.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: NIyyarmu shine mu kara jan tsarin mu na shekara 2019-2020 wanda zai bada lokacin kasafin kudi sosai don barin ma’aikata su bada hankalin su ga muhimin ayyuka, kulawar kai, da kulawar kaunatattu yayinda ake barin wadanda suke bukatar ko son aiki a ragen tsarin lokaci a cikin makonai masu zuwa.
en-mt: Our intention is to extend our plan for the 2019-2020 year which will allow enough budget time to allow employees to focus on important tasks, self-care, and care of loved ones while leaving those who need or want to work on the schedule. time in the following corners.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Karin wannan lokacin ya kara rage shirin nauyin aiki da matsi a fadin kungiyar.
en-mt: This additional time has further reduced the program's workload and pressure across the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Zamu tura tsarin mu ga tsangayarmu mako mai zuwa tare da sabbin jami’ai da kungiya a kan tsarin mu na gaba don tabbatarwa.
en-mt: We will send our plan to our department next week with new officials and team on our next plan to confirm.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Na gode wa kungiyar APP saboda jagoranci ku a wannan.
en-mt: Thank you APP team for your leadership in this.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Matsayin ofishi, cikin hadari, da tsaftacewa
en-mt: Office level, in danger, and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: A makon da ta gabata mun samu cewa daya daga cikin ma’aikacin na SF-BASEDya kamu da cutar COVID-19.
en-mt: Last week we found out that one of the employees of SF-BASE was infected with the disease of COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Duk da haka, cikin yawaltar kiyayewa, mun samo wata ƙungiya masu tsabtacewar kwayan cuta domin su share dukan farfajiya a ofishin mu na San Francisco.
en-mt: However, in an abundance of caution, we hired a team of professional cleaners to clean the entire floor in our San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: A goge ko ina da abin kashe kwayoyin cuta don hana yaduwar cuta a wuri, harda hanyoyi da bangaren lungu na kasa.
en-mt: Wipe with disinfectant to prevent the spread of disease in the area, including the roads and the corners of the ground.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Ginin na samun sabon yanayi na tsarin kulawa da lura na kayyayaki don tabbatar da lafiyar mutanenta.
en-mt: The building is getting a new state of the art maintenance and monitoring system to ensure the health of its people.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Muna jin dadin cewa za a shirya ofishin duk lokacin da muka shirya dawowa.
en-mt: We appreciate that the office will be ready whenever we plan to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Ofishin mu na DC wanda yake WeWork, wanda ya baiyanar da tsarin CoVID-19 damu da duk wani ma’aikacin DC-BASED
en-mt: Our DC office at WeWork, which explains the CoVID-19 process concerns all DC-BASED employees

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: A makon da ta gabata, Ofishin mu na DC suka zama cikakken wuri tare da bayanan kariya daga San Francisco.
en-mt: Last week, our DC Office became a full site with security information from San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Kamar wasu abokan aikinmu wandanda ke da zama a NYC sun san,muna cikin tattaunawa game da bayar da wata wuri Brooklyn.
en-mt: As some of our colleagues who live in NYC know, we are in discussions about offering a Brooklyn location.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Ana cin gaba da wadannan zance amma ya kan yi jinkiri.
en-mt: These conversations are going on but he is always late.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Wasu ma’aikatanmu suna aiki daga nesa akaro na farko.
en-mt: Some of our employees are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Abokai aikinmu na nesa sun san cewar zai iya zaman daidaitawa ne, kuma suna son su bada shawara.
en-mt: Our remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and they want to offer advice.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: A rage tsawon tattaunawa zuwa dai awa daya ko biyu a jere.
en-mt: Reduce the length of the conversation to one or two hours in a row.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Idan ana buƙatar tsawan lokaci, yi tunani yadda za a rarraba su a cikin kwanakin gaba da yawa.
en-mt: If an extension is needed, think about how to distribute them in the next several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Ƙayyade haduwar sosai, sami dalilin taron, da tura da kayayyakin karatu.
en-mt: Define the meeting well, find out the reason for the meeting, and send the study materials.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Ka sanya bidiyo yazama na ainihi, da kayan aiki irin su Google Docs da Zoom don sauƙaƙe saduwa da sadarwa na kai tsaye ta hanyar intanet.
en-mt: Make video a real-time experience, and use tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate face-to-face meetings and communication over the internet.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Yi jagora don sauƙaƙewar kowane taro, wani don saka idanu akan tattaunawa don tambayoyi da bibiyar jerin masu magana, da kuma wani don taimakawa wajen daukar bayanan (ko hadin gwiwan daukan-rubutu).
en-mt: Have a leader to facilitate each meeting, someone to monitor the discussion for questions and follow the list of speakers, and another to help take notes (or joint note-taking).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Ka tura sakon imel ga tech support idan kan bukata na’urar sa a kune wato headset wanda ke da dadi.
en-mt: Send an email to tech support if you need a headset that is comfortable.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Yi amfani da abin kara lafiyar ka a matsayin abun ciye-ciye.
en-mt: Use your health supplement as a snack.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Shiga tashar #remoties a Slack domin tatauna da abokan aiki game da rarrabawar aiki.
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel on Slack to chat with colleagues about the distribution of work.

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Ayyukan HR tana neman jagora cikin jagorar tushen ginin gizon ergonomics don tallafawa karuwan rarraba aikin a fadin Gidauniyar.
en-mt: The HR function is looking for a lead in ergonomics-based guidance to support the increased distribution of work across the Foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Mun tambayi dukan al’uma a makon da ta gabata su ba magajiya su sauke tallafin kudin Wikimedia ga jama’a, kamar editathons, har sai WHO tace annobar ya kare.
en-mt: We asked the whole community last week to give successors and drop Wikimedia funding to the public, such as editathons, until the WHO says the epidemic is over.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Mun sanar da cewa mun fahimta bukatun mu na dakatar da wasu ƙuntatawa zai sa gamawar yarjejeniyan tallafin kudin su da wuya da cewa babu wani wanda za a hukuna domin bata lokaci ko gyara manufofin.
en-mt: We have announced that we understand our need to suspend certain restrictions will make it difficult to complete the financial support agreement and that no one will be penalized for wasting time or modifying policies.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Zamu sake bi da karin jagorori cikin mako mai zuwa kan Wikimedia da wasu yanki da taron al’uma yadda aka saba.
en-mt: We will follow up with more guides in the coming week on Wikimedia and other areas and community forums as usual.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Tunanin mutane gabaki daya daga al’uman duniya ya nuna zaman a matsayin bakin ciki da rushewa amma an sake a ganawa maikyau da karfin mai da hankali a kan al’umai, Wikimedia da in ba haka ba.
en-mt: The thoughts of people in general from the nations of the world showed the existence as sad and broken but there was a meeting again with the power to focus on the nations, Wikimedia and otherwise.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Cin gaba, CRT tana aiki wajen samar da shafi ta META-WIKI don samar da fili don al’uma zasu lura kuma su rika bin dukkanin bayananmu da su.
en-mt: Moving forward, CRT is working on creating a META-WIKI page to provide a place for the community to view and follow all of our information.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Kasance cikin lura da duk abinda ya shafi COVID-19
en-mt: Stay up to date with all things related to COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Zamu tura muku da gayyatar ta kalanda Ranar Alhamis mai zuwa, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT don taron na mussamma ga ma’aikatan mu.
en-mt: We will send you the invitation by calendar next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for the meeting dedicated to our employees.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Za mu yi amfani da wannan lokacin don raba ƙarin sabuntawa, amsa tambayoyin kuma kashe ɗan lokaci kaɗan don haɗu da juna.
en-mt: We will use this time to share more updates, answer questions and spend some time connecting with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Muna cikin wannan tare kuma muna nan mu taimaki duk yadda za mu iya.
en-mt: We are in this together and we are here to help however we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: A dan lokaci nan, zaku iya samun bayanan na ta wannan imel, da kuma wurin da ya shafi bayanai iri daya na COVID-19 kan Office Wiki,
en-mt: In the meantime, you can find my information via this email, as well as similar information related to COVID-19 on the Office Wiki,

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT kan aje shafukan ne da kyau da dukan bayanaia wuri guda.
en-mt: CRT keeps the pages well and all the information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Muna aiki don ci gaba da sadarwa tare da ma'aikata waɗanda suke zaune a cikin ƙasashen da a halin yanzu suke shafa.
en-mt: We are working to maintain communication with employees who live in the countries that are currently affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Idan kana da tambaya game da yin tafiya, ko wani sha’ani, ko wani aiki, ko cike gurbi ko wani abu to kana bukatar taimako kar kaji komai ka sanar damu ka ba CRT goyon baya.
en-mt: If you have a question about traveling, or any business, or any job, or filling a vacancy or anything else, then you need help, don't hesitate to report your concern and give CRT support.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Muna nan don mu bada taimakon mu da tallafi idan an bukaci hakan.
en-mt: We are here to offer our help and support if needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Idan kana da wani abu mai muhimmanci ko al’amari mai bukatar kulawa, don Allah ka tura sakon imel ga Bryan Judan - Darectan HR International Global Operations.
en-mt: If you have an important matter or matter that needs attention, please send an email to Bryan Judan - Directan HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Kada a ga wadannan canje-canje a matsayin barin aiki gaba daya da takalifi.
en-mt: These changes should not be seen as a complete abandonment of work and obligation.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Maimakon haka, suna sanen cewa a wannan lokacin, aikin mu da takalifin kan iya buƙaci daidaitawa ta hanyar da ba mu yi ba a da.
en-mt: Rather, they are aware that at this time, our work and obligations may need to be adjusted in a way that we have not done before.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Wadannan sune matakan da muke gani yana da muhimmanci domin tallafawa juna sabo da mu ci gaba da gudanar da aiki, mu samar wa kungiyar mu da taimakon da suke bukata, da aikin da duniya ta dogara.
en-mt: These are the measures that we see as important in order to support each other as we continue to work, to provide our group with the help they need, and the work that the world depends on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Tsarin aikin mu na nan kuma na kan jiran mu idan lokacin ya yi.
en-mt: Our work schedule is here and waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: A yanzu, lokaci ne na kula da juna a kuma samar da wuri domin muhimancin aikin da ke zuwa cikin makonai da watakila watanai masu zuwa.
en-mt: Now, it is time to take care of each other and make room for the important work that is coming in the next few months and maybe the next months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Muna bukatan goyon bayan ku wajen tabbatar da hakan ta yiwu, don haka muna so ku kula da kan ku da iyalan ku don kusamu damar taimakawar idan bukatan haka ta taso.
en-mt: We need your support in making this possible, so we want you to take care of yourself and your family so that we can help if the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Yanzu, don Allah - ku wanke hannuwanku kuma kada ku taɓa fuskarku!
en-mt: Now, please - wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, ita CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), tare da sauran shuwagabanni (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, da Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, her CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), along with other leaders (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V , Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: Juyawar b’Angiotensin enzyme na 2 (ACE2) wani enzyme ne wanda aka haɗe zuwa saman farfajiya (membranes cell) na sel a cikin huhu, arteries, zuciya, koda, da hanji.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme that is attached to the surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 yana ƙididdige ayyukan aikin enzyme mai alaƙa da haɗin gwiwa (ACE) ta hanyar rage yawan ƙwayar angiotensin-II da haɓaka Ang (1-7) yana sanya shi manufa mai mahimmanci don magance cututtukan zuciya. ACE2 kuma yana aiki azaman hanyar shiga cikin sel don wasu coronaviruses.
en-mt: ACE2 inhibits the activity of angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the concentration of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang (1-7) making it an important target for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. ACE2 also acts as an entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Irin ra’ayi enzyme na dan Adam ana kiransa hACE2.
en-mt: The human enzyme is called hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Ingantaccen enzyme na Angiotensin 2 shine zinc wanda ke dauke da ironloenzyme wanda yake a saman endothelial da sauran sel.
en-mt: The effective enzyme of Angiotensin 2 is zinc containing ironloenzyme which is on the surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Abubuwan gina jiki na ACE2 ya ƙunshi yanki na N-terminal peptidase M2 da yankin C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transportar domain.
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains the N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and the C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 nau'ikan furotin membrane ne mai wucewa, tare da yanki mai aiki na enzymatically wanda yake fallasa saman sel a cikin huhu da sauran kyallen jiki.
en-mt: ACE2 is a transmembrane protein, with an enzymatically active domain that is exposed on the surface of cells in the lung and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Yankin extracellular na ACE2 an barke shi daga yanki mai ƙwayar cuta ta wani enzyme da aka sani da zubar da jini, kuma sakamakon furotin mai narkewa ana fitar dashi cikin magudanar jini kuma a ƙarshe ya kasance cikin fitsari.
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the intracellular domain by an enzyme known as efflux, and the resulting soluble protein is excreted into the bloodstream and eventually into the urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 yana nan cikin yawancin gabobin: ACE2 na haɗu da fatar mafi yawa nau’in huhu II na tantanin halitar alveolar, enterocytes na ƙananan hanji, jijiya da ƙwayoyin jijiyoyin tantanin halita na zuciya da kuma ƙwayoyin tsoka mai laushi a cikin yawancin gabobin.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in many organs: ACE2 is associated with the skin, mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, nerve and nerve cells of the heart and smooth muscle cells in many organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 MRNA bayanana ana iya samun su a cerebral cortex, straitum hypotamalamus da briainstem.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression can be found in the cerebral cortex, straitum hypothalamus and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Aikin farko na ACE2 shine tsaya a matsayin daidaita ma'auni ga ACE.
en-mt: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a balancing factor for ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE ta kuntatawa angiotensin I hormone cikin vasoconstricting angiotensin II.
en-mt: ACE inhibits angiotensin I hormone into vasoconstricting angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 bi da bi ya kuntatawa da carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine daga angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) da hydrolyses shi cikin vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
en-mt: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp- Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 na iya share wasu peptides da suka hada da [des-Arg9] -bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, da ghrelin.
en-mt: ACE2 can clear other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 kuma yana daidaita fataucin membrane na tsaka mai ɗaukar amino acid SLC6A19 kuma yana da nasaba da cutar ta Hartnup.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates membrane trafficking of the mediated amino acid carrier SLC6A19 and is implicated in Hartnup's disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: A matsayin transmembrane furotin, ACE2 na aiki a matsayin babban hanyar shiga cikin tantanin halita (Cell) ga wasu coronavirus, hade da HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (kwayar cuta da ke haifar da SARS); da SARS-CoV-2 (kwayar cuta da ke haifar da COVID-19).
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 acts as the main entry point into the cell (Cell) for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: mussaman kamar dai hadewar protein spike s1 na sars-cov da sars-cov2 do hadewa majinyacin a ACE2 a sansanin kwayar halitta wanda sakakmakon haka na haifar da endocytosis da translocation na cutar da ma kwayar hallitar a cikin endosome wanda ce a cikin cells.
en-mt: especially as the combination of protein spike s1 of sars-cov and sars-cov2 to connect the patient to ACE2 in the cell camp which results in endocytosis and translocation of the disease and the host cell in the endosome which is in the cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: mashigar na tar-tare da dukkan kaidojin priming na S protein na daga maajin serine protease TMPRSS2, da samuwar wanda ake bincikawa a yanzua matsayin babban thrapeutic. wanan ya jagoranci saukar kintaci a matakin na ACE2, a cikin cells, wada ka iya taimakawa wajen kokawa da cutar.
en-mt: The entry of tar-with all the priming rules of the S protein from the serine protease TMPRSS2, and the availability of which is currently being investigated as a major thrapeutic. This leads to a decrease in the level of ACE2 in the cells, which can help fight the disease.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: ko da kuwa ya yawan su alummar kwarraru dama sun bukaci cigaba da tsarin ACE inhibitor dama ARB therapyh.
en-mt: Even though there are many of them, the community of experts needs to continue with the ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: wane sake duba aka wallalfa a yuly 11 na 2012 wanda ya gano ACE inhibitiors nada alaka da kaso 34% na ragin sanyi in ka kwatanta da maaunan.
en-mt: A review published on July 11, 2012 found that ACE inhibitors were associated with a 34% reduction in colds compared to the standard.

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: kura hadarin sanyi aka bawa majinyatan ACE inhibitors wanda ka daf da kamuwa da sanyoi. ko mutuwar jiki ko zuciya.
en-mt: ACE inhibitors are given to patients who are at risk of catching colds. or physical or emotional death.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Amfani da masu hana kwayoyin cuta na ACE shima yana da alaƙa da rage yawan mace-macen huhu, kodayake sakamakon da aka samu ba shi da ƙima baya ga haɗarin cutar huhu.
en-mt: The use of ACE inhibitors is also associated with a reduction in lung mortality, although the results are not statistically significant in terms of lung disease risk.

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Haduwar tantanin halita mutum wato Recombination human ACE2 (rhACE2) ana zaton zaman jinyar tsanani ciwon huhu, ya bayyana zuwa ingantawar aikin huhun da isashen iska a cikin kananan aledu da jawowar cututtukar lipopolysaccharide wanda ke haifar alamun tsananin gajiyar hanyar numfashi.
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is thought to be a treatment for severe lung cancer, has been shown to improve lung function and ventilation in small pigs and induced lipopolysaccharide disease which causes signs of severe respiratory fatigue.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: rabin ran RHACE2 a mutane na da sa’a 10 da aikin dakika 30 ciki harda karin aikin sa’a 24.
en-mt: The half-life of RHACE2 in humans is 10 hours and 30 seconds of activity, including an additional 24 hour activity.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Yawancin binciken da aka samu sun nuna cewa rhACE2 na iya zama magani wadanda basa jureyar renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) ko a cututtuka in da kewayewar anglotensin II na ɗaukaka. An kimanta rhACE2 wanda aka cika a gwajin asibiti domin jinyar alamun tsananin gajiyar hanyar numfashi.
en-mt: Many studies have shown that rhACE2 can be a treatment for those who are not resistant to renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where the circulation of anglotensin II is elevated. rhACE2 has been evaluated in a clinical trial for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 sune aikace-aikacen software na wayar hannu waɗanda aka tsara don taimaka wajan tuntuɓar ganowa don mayar da martani ga cutar ta coronavirus ta 2019-20, watau aiwatar da gano mutane ("lambobin sadarwa") waɗanda wataƙila sun kasance suna hulɗa da mutumin da ya kamu.
en-mt: b'COVID-19 are mobile software applications designed to assist contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying individuals ("contacts") who may have been contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: neman shiga da dama aka kero ko samo, amman da tallafin gwamnati a wasu yankunan da mazaunan bayannane.
en-mt: Seeking to enter many opportunities have been sought or found, but with government support in some areas where the residents are known.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: tsari da dama dan gano wanda aka yi alaka dasu aka bijiro.
en-mt: A number of processes to find out who has been connected with them have been revealed.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: An tayar da damuwar sirri, musamman game da tsarin da ya danganta ga bin wuraren kasashen masu amfani da manahaja.
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially regarding the system that is linked to tracking the locations of countries that use the software.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: karamin wani KAFAR na amfani da iska don shiga sansanin yanar wassu wayoyin.
en-mt: A small one KAFAR uses the air to enter the camp of other phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: A ranar 10 ga Afrilu 2020, Google da Apple sun ba da sanarwar cewa za su haɗu da ayyuka don tallafa wa irin waɗannan aikace-aikacen da ke cikin Bluetooth kai tsaye a cikin tsarin aikinsu na Android da iOS.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple announced that they will join forces to support such applications in Bluetooth directly in their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: A cikin China, gwamnatin kasar, tare da hadin gwiwar Alipay, ta tura wani manahaja wanda barin 'yan ƙasa damar bincika idan sun kasance suna hulɗa da mutanen da ke da cutar COVID-19.
en-mt: In China, the government, with the cooperation of Alipay, has deployed a program that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people who have the disease of COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Ana amfani da shi sama da biranen China fiye da 200. A Singapore, ana amfani da wani app da ake kira TraceTogether.
en-mt: It is used in more than 200 Chinese cities. In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Al'umar gida na IT ne suka kirkiro manahanjar, an sake shi a matsayin budade ne kuma za a mika shi ga gwamnati. Arewacin Makidoniya ta ƙaddamar da "StopKorona!", Wata manahanja ce ta Bluetooth don gano haɗarin daga mutanen da ke kamuwa da kwaya cutar kuma suna ba da amsa ga hukumomin lafiya.
en-mt: The software was developed by the local IT community, has been released as open source and will be handed over to the government. North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth app to detect the risk from people who are infected with the virus and provide a response to the health authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Ma'aikatar Sadarwa da Fasaha da Ma'aikatar Kiwon lafiya ne suka kirkiri app din.
en-mt: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Tun daga ranar 14 ga watan Afrilu 2020, app ɗin yana jiran amincewa daga Google Play Store da Apple App Store.
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, the app is awaiting approval from the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.

en-mt: Contact tracing privacy protection is a well-established process, with a substantial body of research literature that dates back to at least 2013. As of 7 April 2020, more than a dozen experts are working on privacy solutions, such as the use of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to communicate with the user and other mobile phones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Duk da haka, PEPP-PT ƙoƙari ne na haɗin gwiwar wanda ya ƙunshi duka hanyoyin tsakiya da kuma hanyoyin sassauƙa, ba yarjejeniya ɗaya ba. Ka'idojin da aka ba da sun hada da Kan Sirri na Shaida (DP-PPT / DP-3T), Lambobin Gida na Lokaci (TCN, fka ayyukar lambobin haduwa, CEN), Tsarin Sirrin da Tsarin Hanyoyi don Binciken Sadarwar Waya (PACT) da sauran su.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a collaborative effort that includes both central and flexible approaches, not a single agreement. The standards provided include Document Privacy (DP-PPT / DP-3T), Time Zone Codes (TCN, CEN), Privacy Policy and Procedures for the Investigation of Telephone Communications (PACT ) and others.

en-mt: 35 patients in Shenzhen test showed they were free of the disease in the middle of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not get it.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: A cikin wani binciken da aka yi a Wuhan a kan mutane 240 da ke fama da cutar huhu, rabi ne aka ba su fulopiravir kuma rabi suka karɓi umifenovir.
en-mt: In a study done in Wuhan on 240 people with pneumonia, half were given fluopiravir and half received umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: hukuma magani na italia na tiunasar wa akan tabacin tallafi na magani da gwajin shi.
en-mt: The Italian medical authority is responsible for the support of the drug and its testing.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, Jamus ta sanar cewa za ta sayi maganin daga Japan don ajiyar ta, kuma za ta yi amfani da sojoji wajen isar da maganin a asibitocin jami'a, inda za a yi amfani da maganin don yi wa marasa lafiya na COVID-19.
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it would buy the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and would use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug would be used to treat patients. of COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Bisa ga rahoton Morning Post na China ta Kudu, Shinzo Abe ya yi yarjejeniya ga gwamnatin Trump domin sayawar magani. Maganin na iya zama mara karfi cikin cututtuka masu tsanani inda kwayar cutan ta yadu.
en-mt: According to the Morning Post of South China, Shinzo Abe made an agreement with the Trump administration for the purchase of medicine. The treatment may be ineffective in severe cases where the virus has spread.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Yana iya zama ba amintaccen amfani ga mata masu juna biyu ko waɗanda ke ƙoƙarin yin ciki.
en-mt: It may not be safe for pregnant women or those trying to conceive.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Daya daga cikin binciken lopinavir / ritonavir (Kaletra), haɗuwa da maganin rigakafin lopinavir da ritonavir, sun kammala cewa "babu wani fa'ida da aka gani".
en-mt: One of the lopinavir / ritonavir (Kaletra) studies, a combination of lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was seen".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: an shiyar maganin ne ta yanda zai hana HIV zama a ciki da ma kamanceceniya da hadewar protese.
en-mt: the medicine is sold in a way that it will prevent HIV from living inside and also similar to the combination of the prosthesis.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Wata ƙungiyar masu bincike a Jami'ar Colorado suna ƙoƙarin sauya magungunan don samo wani fili wanda zai ɗaure tare da kariya ta SARS-CoV-2.Da akwai zargi a cikin ƙungiyar kimiyya game da ba da gudummawar albarkatun don sake dawo da magunguna musamman da aka tsara don cutar HIV / Kanjamau.
en-mt: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado is trying to change the drug to find a compound that will bind with the protection of SARS-CoV-2. designed for HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: Hukumar ta WHO ta hada da lopinavir / ritonavir a cikin shari'ar Solidarity ta kasa da kasa.
en-mt: The WHO included lopinavir / ritonavir in the international Solidarity case.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir ya kirkiro da haɓaka ta Gilead Sciences a matsayin kwayar cutar Ebola da kamuwa da cutar Marburg. Bayan haka, ilimin kimiyyar Gileyad ya gano cewa Remdesivir yana da aikin rigakafi a cikin fitsari a kan ƙwayoyin cuta masu yawa, ƙwayoyin cuta, paramyxo-, da ƙwayoyin cuta.
en-mt: Remdesivir was developed and developed by Gilead Sciences as a vaccine against Ebola and Marburg virus. After that, Gilead Sciences found that Remdesivir has immunological activity in the urine against many bacteria, viruses, paramyxo-, and bacteria.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Daya daga cikin matsalolin warkar da irin wannan cuta shi ne yakan bijirewa magani ta hanyar sake launi wanda ka iya haifar da wasu cututuka masu tsanani da yaduwa.
en-mt: One of the problems in curing this kind of disease is that it often resists treatment by re-pigmentation which can lead to serious and widespread diseases.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Wasu daga farkon bincike da aka yi sun nuna cewa karatun zai iya samun babbar illa ta hanyar juriya. Akwai gwaji na asibiti da yawa, wadanda suka hada da asibitocin Jami'ar Cleveland guda biyu; daya na mutanen da ke da matsakaici na rashin lafiya da kuma wani don waɗanda ke da tsananin ciwo.
en-mt: Some of the early research suggests that education can have a significant impact on resistance. There are several clinical trials, including two Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate pain and another for those with severe pain.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Akwai gwajin asibiti guda uku masu wanda ake gudanarwa na bitamin C ta cikin Jijiyar jini don mutanen da ke asibiti da rashin lafiya mai tsanani domin COVID-19; sarrafawar maganin gwaji guda biyu (Sin, Kanada) da daya wanda babu sarrafawa (Italiya)
en-mt: There are three clinical trials in which vitamin C is administered intravenously for people hospitalized with severe illness due to COVID-19; two controlled trials (China, Canada) and one uncontrolled (Italy)

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Jihar New York ta fara gwajin garkuwan halita azithromycin a ranar 24 ga watan Maris 2020.
en-mt: New York State began testing azithromycin on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: hukumar kasar japan ta lafiya da magani a duniya NCGM na shirin gwaji teijin alvesco ciclisionide abun shaka na corticosteriod na asthma domin warkar da kamun farko na cutar corona.
en-mt: Japan's agency for health and medicine in the world NCGM is planning to test teijin alvesco ciclisionide inhaled corticosteriod for asthma to cure the first attack of corona disease.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Wani nau'i na angiotensin-mai canza yanayin enzyme 2, an fara gwaji yeneyi Phase II tare da marasa lafiya 200 don ɗaukar su daga mummunan, cututtukan asibiti a Denmark, Jamus, da Austria don sanin tasirin magani.
en-mt: Another type of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial began with 200 patients to take them from serious, hospital diseases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effect of the drug.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Masu Bincike A Makarantar Zuciya Ta Montreal Na Kasar Canada Na bincikan matsayin Colchicine a ragewar kumburi da rikitarwa huhu a marasa lafiya wanda suke Fama Daga Karamin alamun ciwon COVID-19.
en-mt: Researchers at the Montreal Heart School of Canada have investigated the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and lung complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: binciken mai suna colcorona na dauka sama da mutane 6000 masu shekara 40 sama wanda suka kamu da covid-19 kuma sun dana makarancin hali ba na asibiti ba.
en-mt: The colcorona study included more than 6,000 people aged 40 and over who were infected with covid-19 and had a non-hospital condition.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Matan da ke da juna biyu ko masun bada nono ko kuma ba su da ingantaccen tsarin hana haihuwa, ba su cancanta ba.
en-mt: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or do not have effective contraception are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.

en-mt: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: ana amfani da low molecular weight wajen warkar da majinyata, wanda hakan yasa hukumomin italia suka wallafa kaidojin amfani da shi.
en-mt: low molecular weight is used to cure patients, which is why the Italian authorities have published the rules for its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.

en-mt: A study showed 300 patients using enoxaparin sodium as a prophylactic and therapeutic agent that was announced on April 14.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Tunda SARS-CoV-2 kwayar cuta ce, an mayar da hankali sosai kan batun kimiyya don mayar da martani don ƙaddamar da magungunan rigakafin da aka yarda da su wanda aka kirkira don barkewar cutar kamar MERS, SARS, da kwayar cutar ta West Nile.
en-mt: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, much attention has been focused on the scientific issue in response to the introduction of approved vaccines that have been developed for outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Kodayake babu maganin alurar riga kafi da ya kammala gwajin asibiti, akwai ƙoƙarin da yawa a cikin ci gaba don haɓaka irin wannan maganin.
en-mt: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are many efforts in progress to develop such a vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: A ƙarshen Fabrairu 2020, Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ce ba ta tsammanin samun allurar rigakafin ƙwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2, ta zama ƙasa da watanni 18.
en-mt: At the end of February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said that it does not expect to have a vaccine against the SARS-CoV-2 virus, to be less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: ‘Yan maganin rigakafi su biyar na cikin Mataki I na karatun lafiya cikin Afrilu.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: An gano covid-19 a december 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: A wa ni barkewar a duniya a 2020 yasa karin haniun jari a BINCIKEN NEMAN MAGANI.
en-mt: For me, the outbreak in the world in 2020 caused more restrictions on investment in RESEARCH FOR A TREATMENT.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.

en-mt: Many groups are using genetic engineering to develop a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: An fara shi a watan Afrilu, muhimancin himmar CEPI don haɓaka maganin rigakafi da wuri, yawan sarrafawa, turawa da yawa, da samun sa a duk duniya.
en-mt: Launched in April, CEPI's key initiative is to develop vaccines early, widely available, widely deployed, and globally available.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: A watan Afrilu, masanan kimiyya na CEPI sun ba da rahoton cewa hanyoyin fasahar fasaha daban-daban 10 suna ƙarƙashin bincike da haɓakawa a farkon 2020 don ƙirƙirar ingantaccen allurar rigakafin COVID-19.
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technologies are under research and development in early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Wani rahoton cepi na masu fasaha a watan afrilu, magunguna 115 aka fara kerowa da 78 tabbatatu masu cigaba 79 a cewar makarantar miken 37 son sanar amman babu bayani a cikin alumma ana zaton suna tsari ko shiryawa a dakunan gwaji da dama.
en-mt: According to a CEP report by the technicians in April, 115 drugs have been manufactured and 78 are confirmed to be in development.

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: A shashe na I-II na gwajin kiyayewar farko da gwajin garkuwa, ana hade sune ba zabi kuma ba riko da wajen kuma a waje dayawa, wanda ke bada sahihanci dama ingantacen kima.
en-mt: In part I-II of the primary care test and the shield test, they are combined with no choice and no adherence to the outside and many outside, which gives credibility and a better assessment.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Gwajin matakai na III yawanci ya ƙunshi ƙarin mahalarta, gami da rukuni na sarrafawa, da gwajin tasiri na cutar rigakafin don hana cutar, yayin sa ido don tasirin mummunar sakamako mafi kyau.
en-mt: Phase III trials usually involve more participants, including a control group, and testing the effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for the best side effects.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Daga cikin 'yan gwajin rigakafin 79 a cikin ci gaba (wanda aka tabbatar da shi tun farkon Afrilu 2020), 74 ba su kasance cikin kimantawar ɗan Adam ba (har yanzu suna cikin "preclinical” bincike).
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine trials in progress (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 have not been in human evaluation (they are still in "preclinical" research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Kusan ran 24 ga watar Janairu shekarar 2020 a Ostiraliya, Jami'ar Queensland ta ba da sanarwar cewa tana binciken yiwuwar rigakafin ƙwayar cuta wanda zai iya canza kwayar furotin don ta tada tsarin garkuwa.
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the possibility of a vaccine that can change a protein to stimulate the immune system.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: A kusan 24 Janairu 2020 a kasar Kanada, Cibiyar Kula da Alurar rigakafi ta Duniya (VIDO-InterVac) a Jami'ar Saskatchewan ta ba da sanarwar fara aiki a kan allurar rigakafin, da nufin fara gwajin ɗan adam a cikin 2021.
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccination Center (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the start of work on the vaccine, with the aim of starting human trials in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: An sanar da Ayyukan haɓakawar Rigakafi A Hukumar Kula Da Karewar Daga Cuta A 26 ga watar Junairu 2020 A China, Da Jami'ar Honk Kong a ranar 28 ga watan Janairu.
en-mt: The Prevention and Control Promotion Project was announced on January 26, 2020 in China, and by the University of Hong Kong on January 28.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: A wuraren 29 ga watan junairu 2020 kamfanoni magungunna na jassen wanda henneke schuitemaker ke jagoranta, su sanar da fara kirkikra maganin.
en-mt: On January 29, 2020, the pharmaceutical companies of Jassen, led by Henneke Schuitemaker, will announce the start of the drug development.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: janssen na kirkiro magani na rowa tare da abokin huldar shir wadan ya kware a dakin gwaji vaxart.
en-mt: Janssen is developing a sting treatment with a partner who specializes in the Vaxart lab.

en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a joint venture with Vaxart for the development of the vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: A ranar 8 ga Fabrairu 2020, dakin gwaje-gwaje na OncoGen a Romania sun buga takarda kan ƙirar rigakafin tare da fasaha mai kama da wannan don maganin rigakafin cutar kansa.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
